name: OWN SPACE
description:
⭐WELCOME TO MY OWN SPACE ⭐

This is my Project 2  for the CCDP10003 subject.  

🌟I hope you enjoy! 🌟

------------------------------------------------------

For the best experience, the following are recommended:

- Full-Screen (Arrow icons in the bottom right-hand corner of the game screen). To exit the full-screen view,  press the "Esc" button on your keyboard, or move your computer mouse until an "X" icon appears.  

- Using headphones/ turning up the volume to a level you are comfortable with 🎧

------------------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT: This game's pitch features sudden bright flashing lights and loud audio. Please consider if these elements are suitable for you.
